alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Greer; Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 3:08AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total combined sleet and snow accumulations of up to eight tenths of an inch, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Greer, Kiowa and Comanche Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7.
